p: The lymphocyte cultures were prepared using 0.5 ml of venous blood (collected by voluntary venipuncture) and immediately transferred to a culture medium containing 10 ml of RPMI 1640 supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) and 1% streptomycin-penicillin, as described in previous work by our group [ 5, 8, 9] and approved by the Research Ethics Committee of the Federal University of Pampa (n°. 27045614.0.0000.5323). The cells were placed in a greenhouse at 37°C in a 5% CO2 environment for 72 hours.
